main.name: Peter Dudek
main.description: Web Developer leveraging project management and compliance background to build web applications and create the ultimate user experience
main.bio: I am a Pega Certified System Architect leveraging project management and compliance background to build applications that meet business objectives and create the ultimate user experience. I am skilled in Java full-stack software development and web development. Recently obtained a Pega System Architect Certification with strong technical skills in Pega, Java, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React.js, and responsive web design as well as a passion for learning emerging technologies.
main.contactmessage: Contact me to find out how we can work together

resume.skillmessage: Here is a list of my strongest technical skills:

education.school: Columbia University City of New York
education.description: Completed six-month intensive full-stack web development course: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Express.js, React.js, Database Theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Command Line, Git, and more.
Developed a critical awareness of the relationship between Jews and Christians and learned to address complex religious, ethical and social issues to promote justice and peace.
Gained knowledge necessary to work in various positions that require the understanding of international legal regulations and their practical application.

work.title: Pega Certified System Architect / Java Developer
Project Manager / Regulatory Affairs Specialist
work.description: Enhanced company efficacy by implementing new PM software and revising operating procedures, which resulted in timely and cost-effective product launches. Successfully led the Quality Management Team at the Annual ISO Inspections, improving results by 50% for three consecutive years and earning recognition for developing a cutting-edge internal audit program.

work.title: Member

projects.title: Kakeibo
projects.category: The Kakeibo app monitors how much you are spending on streaming services.

projects.title: Google Books Search
projects.category: This React app allows users to search for hundreds of thousands of book titles from all over the world through Google Books API.

projects.category: This app allows you to search, sort, and filter your employee information.

projects.title: Balance Pro 2.0
projects.category: Balance Pro 2.0 is a progressive web app (PWA) that tracks user's withdrawals and deposits with or without an Internet connection.

testimonials.text: Peter and I worked together on the same team and I always admired him for his work ethic, professionalism and intelligence. He has excellent management skills and always goes the extra mile to accomplish what needs to be done. Peter is dedicated, a hard worker and is an asset to the team.

Peter is a great project manager with excellent communication and leadership skills. I have had the opportunity to work with him on a number of complex compliance, legal and regulatory projects and he has demonstrated initiative, adaptability and resilience (...).
